name: Tu Dealer the Game
description:
A runner full of action!

Get ready for the funniest experience with "Tu Dealer The Game", an entertaining action game based on the official video of Pepe Quintana "Tu Dealer" Ft. Arcangel, Niogarcia, Casper Mágico, Santo Niño and Darell, where you will have an epic chase avoiding different obstacles to be the best Dealer of all.
